post.description: Activate a cached file by mapping its cache key to filename prefix. Used for file caching mechanism to improve performance when repeatedly accessing files. Copies file to application path if not present. Requires user authentication.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Cache key identifying the file in cache directory, e.g., 'abc123def456'

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: Filename with extension to determine prefix, e.g., 'document.pdf'

200.description: "Successfully activated file cache, returns true on success or false if prefix not determined"

400.description: {object} controllers.Response "Bad request: Invalid key or filename"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to activate file cache"

post.description: Create a new application from a template. Applications represent deployable services, containers, or workflows. Template must exist before creating application. After creation, use deploy endpoint to start the application. Requires appropriate permissions.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Application object with required fields: owner, name, template, and optional fields: displayName, namespace, configuration, environment, resources, etc.

200.description: "Successfully created application, returns success status and application ID"

400.description: {object} controllers.Response "Bad request: Invalid application data, missing template parameter, template not found, or malformed JSON"

403.description: {object} controllers.Response "Forbidden: Insufficient permissions to create application"

404.description: {object} controllers.Response "Not found: Template does not exist"

409.description: {object} controllers.Response "Conflict: Application with same ID already exists"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to create application"

post.description: Create a new chat conversation with specified configuration. Automatically sets creation time, client IP, user agent, and uses default store if not specified. Users can only create chats for themselves. Tracks client metadata for analytics and security.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Chat object with required fields: user, name, type (single/group), and optional fields: displayName, category, modelProvider, store, temperature, etc.

200.description: "Successfully created chat, returns success status and chat ID"

400.description: {object} controllers.Response "Bad request: Invalid chat data, missing required fields, default store not found, or malformed JSON"

403.description: {object} controllers.Response "Forbidden: Cannot create chat for other users or insufficient permissions"

409.description: {object} controllers.Response "Conflict: Chat with same ID already exists"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to create chat"

post.description: Create new file metadata record for uploaded content. This registers file in the system for vector embedding and knowledge base indexing. File content should be uploaded separately via upload endpoint. Automatically triggers vector generation for RAG if store is configured. Requires appropriate permissions.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: File metadata object with required fields: owner, name, filename, fileType, size, store, and optional fields: displayName, description, tags, etc.

200.description: "Successfully created file record, returns success status and file ID"

400.description: {object} controllers.Response "Bad request: Invalid file data, missing required fields, or malformed JSON"

403.description: {object} controllers.Response "Forbidden: Insufficient permissions to create file"

409.description: {object} controllers.Response "Conflict: File with same ID already exists"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to create file or generate vectors"

post.description: Create a new message in a chat conversation. For user messages, automatically generates AI response using configured model provider. Supports RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) with vector search, tool calls, streaming responses, and various model capabilities. Users can only create messages for themselves. Returns updated chat object with new messages.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Message object with required fields: owner, user, chat, author ('User'/'AI'), text content, and optional fields: replyTo, store, vectorScores, etc.

200.description: "Successfully created message and generated AI response (if applicable), returns updated chat object with messages"

400.description: {object} controllers.Response "Bad request: Invalid message data, missing required fields, chat not found, store not found, or malformed JSON"

403.description: {object} controllers.Response "Forbidden: Cannot create messages for other users, insufficient permissions, or rate limit exceeded"

404.description: {object} controllers.Response "Not found: Chat, store, or provider does not exist"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to create message, generate AI response, or perform vector search"

post.description: Create a new AI provider configuration for LLM models, embedding services, TTS, STT, or MCP tools. Provider owner is automatically set to 'admin'. Configure API credentials, endpoints, model parameters, and service capabilities. Requires appropriate permissions.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Provider object with required fields: name, type, category, clientId/clientSecret (for API auth), host, models, etc.

200.description: "Successfully created provider, returns success status and provider ID"

400.description: {object} controllers.Response "Bad request: Invalid provider data, missing required fields, or malformed JSON"

403.description: {object} controllers.Response "Forbidden: Insufficient permissions to create provider"

409.description: {object} controllers.Response "Conflict: Provider with same ID already exists"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to create provider"

parameters.name: sync
parameters.description: Set to 'true' or '1' to enable synchronous processing

post.description: Add session for one user in one application. If there are other existing sessions, join the session into the list.

Create a new store with specified configuration. The store is a knowledge base that stores vectors for semantic search. When creating a default store, automatically unsets other default stores. Requires appropriate permissions.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Store object with required fields: owner, name, displayName, provider, embedding model configuration, etc.

200.description: "Successfully created store, returns success status and store ID"

400.description: {object} controllers.Response "Bad request: Invalid store data, missing required fields, or malformed JSON"

403.description: {object} controllers.Response "Forbidden: Insufficient permissions to create store"

409.description: {object} controllers.Response "Conflict: Store with same ID already exists"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to create store"

post.description: Create a new template with reusable configuration for applications, workflows, agents, or other resources. Templates allow quick creation of preconfigured instances with consistent settings. Requires appropriate permissions.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Template object with required fields: owner, name, type, and optional fields: displayName, configuration, parameters, description, tags, etc.

200.description: "Successfully created template, returns success status and template ID"

400.description: {object} controllers.Response "Bad request: Invalid template data, missing required fields, or malformed JSON"

403.description: {object} controllers.Response "Forbidden: Insufficient permissions to create template"

409.description: {object} controllers.Response "Conflict: Template with same ID already exists"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to create template"

post.description: Create new vector embedding for text content or file chunk. Automatically generates embedding using configured embedding provider (OpenAI, Azure, etc.) if not provided. Vectors are stored for semantic search and RAG functionality. Uses default embedding provider if not specified. Requires appropriate permissions.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Vector object with required fields: owner, name, text (content to embed), store, and optional fields: file, dataType, provider, embedding data, etc.

200.description: "Successfully created vector embedding, returns success status and vector ID"

400.description: {object} controllers.Response "Bad request: Invalid vector data, missing required fields, or malformed JSON"

403.description: {object} controllers.Response "Forbidden: Insufficient permissions to create vector"

404.description: {object} controllers.Response "Not found: Embedding provider not configured"

409.description: {object} controllers.Response "Conflict: Vector with same ID already exists"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to create vector or generate embedding"

get.description: verify WeChat work bot callback URL

post.description: Delete all vector embeddings for admin owner. This operation is irreversible and removes all vectors from semantic search index. Use with extreme caution as it will break all RAG functionality until vectors are regenerated. Requires admin permissions.

200.description: "Successfully deleted all vectors, returns true if all deletions succeeded, false if any failed"

403.description: {object} controllers.Response "Forbidden: Insufficient admin permissions"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to delete some or all vectors"

post.description: Delete an existing application and clean up associated resources. If application is deployed, it will be undeployed first. This operation removes containers, services, and configuration. Requires appropriate permissions.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Application object to delete, must include at least owner and name fields

200.description: "Successfully deleted application and cleaned up resources, returns success status"

400.description: {object} controllers.Response "Bad request: Invalid application data or malformed JSON"

403.description: {object} controllers.Response "Forbidden: Insufficient permissions to delete application"

404.description: {object} controllers.Response "Not found: Application does not exist"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to delete application or undeploy resources"

post.description: Delete an existing chat conversation and all associated messages. This operation is irreversible and removes all chat history, messages, and metadata. Users can only delete their own chats. Requires user ownership verification.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Chat object to delete, must include at least owner, name, and user fields for ownership verification

200.description: "Successfully deleted chat and associated messages, returns success status"

400.description: {object} controllers.Response "Bad request: Invalid chat data or malformed JSON"

403.description: {object} controllers.Response "Forbidden: Cannot delete other users' chats or insufficient permissions"

404.description: {object} controllers.Response "Not found: Chat does not exist"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to delete chat or messages"

post.description: Delete file metadata and associated data including vectors, embeddings, and storage content. This operation is irreversible and removes the file from knowledge base and search index. Requires appropriate permissions.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: File object to delete, must include at least owner and name fields

200.description: "Successfully deleted file and associated data, returns success status"

400.description: {object} controllers.Response "Bad request: Invalid file data or malformed JSON"

403.description: {object} controllers.Response "Forbidden: Insufficient permissions to delete file"

404.description: {object} controllers.Response "Not found: File does not exist"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to delete file or clean up storage"

post.description: Delete an existing message from a chat conversation. This operation is irreversible and removes the message and its metadata. Note: Consider using this carefully as it may break conversation context for AI responses.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Message object to delete, must include at least owner and name fields

400.description: {object} controllers.Response "Bad request: Invalid message data or malformed JSON"

403.description: {object} controllers.Response "Forbidden: Insufficient permissions to delete message"

404.description: {object} controllers.Response "Not found: Message does not exist"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to delete message"

post.description: Delete an existing AI provider configuration. This removes the provider from the system and any stores or chats using it will need to be reconfigured. Ensure no active services depend on this provider before deletion. Requires appropriate permissions.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Provider object to delete, must include at least owner and name fields

400.description: {object} controllers.Response "Bad request: Invalid provider data or malformed JSON"

403.description: {object} controllers.Response "Forbidden: Insufficient permissions to delete provider"

404.description: {object} controllers.Response "Not found: Provider does not exist"

409.description: {object} controllers.Response "Conflict: Provider is in use by stores or chats"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to delete provider"

post.description: Delete session for one user in one application.

Delete an existing store and all its associated data. Cannot delete the default store - another store must be set as default first. This operation also removes all vectors and files associated with the store. Requires appropriate permissions.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Store object to delete, must include at least owner and name fields

400.description: {object} controllers.Response "Bad request: Cannot delete default store, invalid store data, or malformed JSON"

403.description: {object} controllers.Response "Forbidden: Insufficient permissions to delete store"

404.description: {object} controllers.Response "Not found: Store does not exist"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to delete store"

post.description: Delete an existing template. This removes the template configuration but does not affect instances created from it. Requires appropriate permissions.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Template object to delete, must include at least owner and name fields

400.description: {object} controllers.Response "Bad request: Invalid template data or malformed JSON"

403.description: {object} controllers.Response "Forbidden: Insufficient permissions to delete template"

404.description: {object} controllers.Response "Not found: Template does not exist"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to delete template"

post.description: Delete a vector embedding from the system. This removes the vector from semantic search index and frees up storage. Deleting vectors may affect RAG quality if they contain important context. Requires appropriate permissions.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Vector object to delete, must include at least owner and name fields

400.description: {object} controllers.Response "Bad request: Invalid vector data or malformed JSON"

403.description: {object} controllers.Response "Forbidden: Insufficient permissions to delete vector"

404.description: {object} controllers.Response "Not found: Vector does not exist"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to delete vector"

post.description: Delete a welcome message for anonymous or authenticated users. For anonymous users, verifies ownership using client IP and user agent hash. For authenticated users, verifies user ownership. Used to dismiss welcome/onboarding messages in chat interfaces.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Message object to delete, must include at least owner and name fields

200.description: "Successfully deleted welcome message, returns success status"

400.description: {object} controllers.Response "Bad request: Invalid message data or malformed JSON"

401.description: {object} controllers.Response "Unauthorized: Login required for non-anonymous users"

403.description: {object} controllers.Response "Forbidden: No permission to delete this welcome message (user mismatch or client verification failed)"

404.description: {object} controllers.Response "Not found: Message does not exist"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to delete welcome message"

post.description: Deploy application synchronously and wait for completion. Updates application configuration first, then deploys to target environment (Docker, Kubernetes, etc.). This operation starts containers, services, and configures networking. Returns updated application with deployment status. Requires appropriate permissions.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Application object with configuration for deployment including template, namespace, environment, resources, etc.

200.description: "Successfully deployed application, returns updated application object with deployment status"

400.description: {object} controllers.Response "Bad request: Invalid application data, application not found, or malformed JSON"

403.description: {object} controllers.Response "Forbidden: Insufficient permissions to deploy application"

404.description: {object} controllers.Response "Not found: Application or template does not exist"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to update or deploy application, deployment failed, or infrastructure error"

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The text to convert to speech

get.description: convert text to speech with streaming

200.description: {stream} string "An event stream of audio chunks in base64 format"

get.description: Get messages for a specific user and chat conversation with user isolation enforcement. Non-admin users can only view their own messages. Admin users can view all messages or filter by selectedUser. Returns all messages in a chat conversation including both user and AI responses.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: User ID in format 'owner/name', e.g., 'admin/user1' (optional for admins)

parameters.name: chat
parameters.description: Chat ID to filter messages by specific conversation, e.g., 'chat-123abc'

parameters.name: selectedUser
parameters.description: Selected user for admin to view specific user's messages, e.g., 'admin/user1'

200.description: "Successfully returns array of message objects in chronological order"

400.description: {object} controllers.Response "Bad request: Invalid parameters"

403.description: {object} controllers.Response "Forbidden: Cannot view other users' messages"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to retrieve messages"

get.description: Get current user account information including user profile, roles, and permissions. Returns user claims from the active session. If no user is signed in and preview mode is enabled, creates an anonymous user session automatically.

200.description: "Successfully returns current user account information with JWT claims"

401.description: {object} controllers.Response "Unauthorized: Login required (when preview mode is disabled)"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to retrieve account information"

get.description: Get the cache path for an active file by its prefix. Returns the cached file path if the file has been activated, or empty string if not found in cache. Used to check if a file is cached and get its cache location.

parameters.name: prefix
parameters.description: File prefix to look up in cache map, e.g., 'document'

200.description: {string} string "Successfully returns cache path string (e.g., 'cache/abc123') or empty string if not cached"

400.description: {object} controllers.Response "Bad request: Invalid prefix parameter"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to retrieve cache information"

get.description: Get detailed information of a specific application including deployment status, configuration, template, namespace, resource usage, and runtime details. Applications can be containers, services, or workflows managed by Casibase.

200.description: "Successfully returns application object with all deployment and configuration details"

400.description: {object} controllers.Response "Bad request: Invalid application ID format"

403.description: {object} controllers.Response "Forbidden: Insufficient permissions to access this application"

404.description: {object} controllers.Response "Not found: Application does not exist"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to retrieve application"

get.description: Get applications for a specific owner with optional pagination, filtering and sorting. Applications represent deployable services, containers, or workflows managed by Casibase. When pageSize and p parameters are provided, returns paginated results. Supports filtering and sorting by various fields.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: Owner of the applications, typically 'admin', e.g., 'admin'

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of items per page for pagination, e.g., '10'

200.description: "Successfully returns array of application objects with deployment details, optional pagination info"

400.description: {object} controllers.Response "Bad request: Invalid owner parameter"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to retrieve applications"

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id ( owner/name ) of the asset

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id ( owner/name ) of the caase

get.description: Get detailed information of a specific chat conversation including messages, model provider, store configuration, and metadata. Returns complete chat object with all associated data.

200.description: "Successfully returns chat object with all details"

400.description: {object} controllers.Response "Bad request: Invalid chat ID format"

403.description: {object} controllers.Response "Forbidden: Insufficient permissions to access this chat"

404.description: {object} controllers.Response "Not found: Chat does not exist"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to retrieve chat"

get.description: Get chat conversations for a specific user with filtering and time range support. Enforces user isolation - non-admin users can only view their own chats. Admin users can view all chats or filter by selectedUser. Supports store filtering and time range filtering.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: User ID in format 'owner/name', e.g., 'admin/user1' (optional for admins)

parameters.name: selectedUser
parameters.description: Selected user for admin to view specific user's chats, e.g., 'admin/user1'

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: Filter by start time (ISO 8601 format), e.g., '2024-01-01T00:00:00Z'

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: Filter by end time (ISO 8601 format), e.g., '2024-12-31T23:59:59Z'

400.description: {object} controllers.Response "Bad request: Invalid parameters"

403.description: {object} controllers.Response "Forbidden: Cannot view other users' chats"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to retrieve chats"

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id ( owner/name ) of the consultation

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id ( owner/name ) of the container

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id ( owner/name ) of the doctor

get.description: Get detailed metadata of a specific file including filename, size, type, upload time, processing status, vector embeddings, and storage location. Files represent documents and content stored in knowledge bases for semantic search and RAG.

200.description: "Successfully returns file metadata object with all details"

400.description: {object} controllers.Response "Bad request: Invalid file ID format"

403.description: {object} controllers.Response "Forbidden: Insufficient permissions to access this file"

404.description: {object} controllers.Response "Not found: File does not exist"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to retrieve file"

get.description: Get file metadata for a specific owner with optional store filtering. Returns file objects representing documents, images, videos, and other content stored in knowledge bases. Use store parameter to filter files by specific store.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: Owner of the files, typically 'admin', e.g., 'admin'

parameters.name: store
parameters.description: Filter by store name to get files from specific store, e.g., 'store-built-in'

200.description: "Successfully returns array of file metadata objects"

400.description: {object} controllers.Response "Bad request: Invalid owner parameter"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to retrieve files"

get.description: Get all global chat conversations with optional pagination, filtering and sorting. When pageSize and p parameters are provided, returns paginated results. Supports filtering by field/value pairs and sorting by specified fields. Used for admin chat management.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of items per page for pagination, e.g., '10'

200.description: "Successfully returns array of chat objects with optional pagination info"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to retrieve chats"

get.description: Get all global file metadata with optional pagination, filtering and sorting. Files represent documents, images, videos, and other content stored in stores for RAG and knowledge base. When pageSize and p parameters are provided, returns paginated results with admin permission check. Supports filtering and sorting by various fields.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of items per page for pagination, e.g., '10'

200.description: "Successfully returns array of file metadata objects with optional pagination info"

401.description: {object} controllers.Response "Unauthorized: Admin login required for paginated access"

403.description: {object} controllers.Response "Forbidden: Insufficient admin permissions"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to retrieve files"

get.description: Get all global messages with optional pagination, filtering and sorting. When pageSize and p parameters are provided, returns paginated results. Supports filtering by field/value pairs, sorting, and store filtering. Used for admin message management and moderation.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of items per page for pagination, e.g., '10'

200.description: "Successfully returns array of message objects with optional pagination info"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to retrieve messages"

get.description: Get all global AI providers (LLM, embedding, TTS, STT, etc.) available in the system. Returns providers with sensitive credentials masked for security. Providers include OpenAI, Azure, Anthropic, and other AI service configurations.

200.description: "Successfully returns array of provider objects with masked credentials"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to retrieve providers"

get.description: Get all global stores with optional pagination and filtering. When pageSize and p parameters are provided, returns paginated results with admin permission check. Supports filtering by name, field, value and sorting. Requires admin privileges for paginated access.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of items per page for pagination, e.g., '10'

200.description: "Successfully returns array of store objects with optional pagination info"

401.description: {object} controllers.Response "Unauthorized: Admin login required for paginated access"

403.description: {object} controllers.Response "Forbidden: Insufficient admin permissions"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to retrieve stores"

get.description: Get all global vector embeddings stored in the system. Vectors represent semantic embeddings of text chunks, files, and documents used for RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) and similarity search. Each vector contains embedding data, text content, and metadata.

200.description: "Successfully returns array of vector objects with embeddings and metadata"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to retrieve vectors"

get.description: Get detailed information of a specific message including text content, author (User/AI), tokens used, vector scores, error details, and metadata. Returns complete message object with all associated data.

200.description: "Successfully returns message object with all details including text, author, tokens, vector scores, etc."

400.description: {object} controllers.Response "Bad request: Invalid message ID format"

403.description: {object} controllers.Response "Forbidden: Insufficient permissions to access this message"

404.description: {object} controllers.Response "Not found: Message does not exist"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to retrieve message"

get.description: Stream AI-generated response for a message using Server-Sent Events (SSE). Generates AI answer with RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) using vector search, model context, and conversation history. Supports streaming responses for real-time chat experience. Message must be an AI message with empty text waiting for response. Performs vector similarity search, retrieves relevant context, and generates response using configured LLM provider.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Message ID in format 'owner/name' for the AI message awaiting response, e.g., 'admin/message-123abc'

200.description: {string} string "Event stream (text/event-stream) with JSON chunks containing AI response text, tokens, vector scores, and completion status"

400.description: {object} controllers.Response "Bad request: Invalid message ID, message is not an AI message, text is not empty, replyTo is missing, or content filtered by provider"

403.description: {object} controllers.Response "Forbidden: Insufficient permissions or rate limit exceeded"

404.description: {object} controllers.Response "Not found: Message, chat, store, or provider does not exist"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to generate response, vector search failed, or LLM API error"

parameters.description: The id ( owner/name ) of the node

get.description: get system info like CPU and memory usage

Get detailed information of a specific template including configuration, parameters, and metadata. Templates provide reusable configurations for creating applications, workflows, agents, and other resources with predefined settings.

200.description: "Successfully returns template object with all configuration and metadata"

400.description: {object} controllers.Response "Bad request: Invalid template ID format"

403.description: {object} controllers.Response "Forbidden: Insufficient permissions to access this template"

404.description: {object} controllers.Response "Not found: Template does not exist"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to retrieve template"

get.description: Get templates for a specific owner with optional pagination, filtering and sorting. Templates define reusable configurations for applications, workflows, and agents. When pageSize and p parameters are provided, returns paginated results. Supports filtering and sorting by various fields.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: Owner of the templates, typically 'admin', e.g., 'admin'

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of items per page for pagination, e.g., '10'

200.description: "Successfully returns array of template objects with optional pagination info"

400.description: {object} controllers.Response "Bad request: Invalid owner parameter"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to retrieve templates"

get.description: Get detailed information of a specific vector embedding including embedding data, text content, file reference, data type, and metadata. Vectors represent semantic embeddings used for similarity search and RAG.

200.description: "Successfully returns vector object with embedding data and metadata"

400.description: {object} controllers.Response "Bad request: Invalid vector ID format"

403.description: {object} controllers.Response "Forbidden: Insufficient permissions to access this vector"

404.description: {object} controllers.Response "Not found: Vector does not exist"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to retrieve vector"

get.description: Get vector embeddings for admin owner with optional pagination, filtering and store isolation. When pageSize and p parameters are provided, returns paginated results. Store isolation is enforced based on user's homepage field. Vectors are used for semantic search and RAG functionality.

parameters.name: store
parameters.description: Filter by store name for store isolation

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of items per page for pagination, e.g., '10'

200.description: "Successfully returns array of vector objects with optional pagination info"

403.description: {object} controllers.Response "Forbidden: Store isolation violation"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to retrieve vectors"

get.description: get version info like Casdoor release version and commit ID
check if the system is live

post.description: install an OS patch by patch ID (KB number or title) asynchronously

parameters.name: patchId
parameters.description: The patch ID (KB number or title)

parameters.name: scan
parameters.description: The scan ID (owner/name) for async execution

get.description: Check if there are other different sessions for one user in one application.

200.description: {string} string The Response metrics in Prometheus format

parameters.name: audio
parameters.description: The audio file to convert to text

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id ( owner/name ) of the record

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id ( owner/name ) of the record

post.description: Refresh and reload Model Context Protocol (MCP) tools from the specified provider. MCP providers expose external tools and functions that can be used by AI models. This operation fetches the latest tool definitions and capabilities from the MCP server. Requires appropriate permissions.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Provider object with owner and name to identify which MCP provider to refresh

200.description: "Successfully refreshed MCP tools, returns updated provider object with refreshed tool list"

400.description: {object} controllers.Response "Bad request: Invalid provider data, not an MCP provider, or malformed JSON"

403.description: {object} controllers.Response "Forbidden: Insufficient permissions to refresh MCP tools"

404.description: {object} controllers.Response "Not found: Provider does not exist"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to connect to MCP server or refresh tools"

post.description: Refresh and regenerate all vectors in the specified store by re-embedding all documents. This is useful after changing embedding models or updating store configuration. The operation may take significant time for large stores. Requires appropriate permissions.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Store object with owner and name to identify which store's vectors to refresh

400.description: {object} controllers.Response "Bad request: Invalid store data or malformed JSON"

403.description: {object} controllers.Response "Forbidden: Insufficient permissions to refresh store vectors"

404.description: {object} controllers.Response "Not found: Store does not exist"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to refresh vectors or embedding service unavailable"

post.description: unified API for scanning assets (combines test-scan and start-scan functionality)

parameters.name: scan
parameters.description: The scan ID (owner/name) for saving results

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: Manual input target (IP address or network range)

parameters.name: command
parameters.description: Scan command with optional %s placeholder for target

parameters.name: saveToScan
parameters.description: Whether to save results to scan object (true/false)

post.description: scan assets from a cloud provider

Authenticate user with OAuth2 authorization code and return JWT claims. This endpoint exchanges the OAuth2 authorization code for an access token and creates a new user session. Requires valid OAuth2 code and state from Casdoor authentication flow.

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: OAuth2 authorization code from Casdoor authentication, e.g., 'abc123def456'

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: OAuth2 state parameter for CSRF protection, e.g., 'random-state-string'

200.description: "Successfully authenticated and returns JWT claims with user information and access token"

400.description: {object} controllers.Response "Bad request: Invalid or expired authorization code"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to process authentication"

post.description: Sign out the current user by clearing session data and invalidating the session ID. Requires an active user session.

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to clear session"

post.description: Undeploy application synchronously and wait for completion. Stops containers, removes services, and cleans up resources in the target environment (Docker, Kubernetes, etc.). Application configuration remains in database for future redeployment. Requires appropriate permissions.

200.description: "Successfully undeployed application and cleaned up resources, returns success status"

400.description: {object} controllers.Response "Bad request: Invalid application ID format or application not found"

403.description: {object} controllers.Response "Forbidden: Insufficient permissions to undeploy application"

404.description: {object} controllers.Response "Not found: Application does not exist"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to undeploy application or clean up resources"

post.description: Update an existing application's configuration including template, namespace, environment variables, resource limits, and deployment settings. Does not trigger redeployment - use deploy endpoint for that. Requires appropriate permissions.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Application object with updated fields including name, displayName, template, namespace, configuration, environment, resources, etc.

400.description: {object} controllers.Response "Bad request: Invalid application data or malformed JSON"

403.description: {object} controllers.Response "Forbidden: Insufficient permissions to update application"

404.description: {object} controllers.Response "Not found: Application does not exist"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to update application"

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id ( owner/name ) of the asset

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id ( owner/name ) of the caase

post.description: Update an existing chat conversation's configuration including model provider, temperature, message history, and other settings. Users can only update their own chats. In demo mode, only ModelProvider can be updated. Requires user ownership verification.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Complete chat object with updated fields including name, displayName, type, category, modelProvider, store, temperature, etc.

400.description: {object} controllers.Response "Bad request: Invalid chat data or malformed JSON"

403.description: {object} controllers.Response "Forbidden: Cannot update other users' chats or insufficient permissions"

404.description: {object} controllers.Response "Not found: Chat does not exist"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to update chat"

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id ( owner/name ) of the consultation

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id ( owner/name ) of the container

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id ( owner/name ) of the doctor

post.description: Update file metadata including filename, display name, description, tags, processing status, and store association. Does not update file content - use upload endpoints to replace file content. Requires appropriate permissions.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: File metadata object with updated fields including name, displayName, description, tags, store, etc.

200.description: "Successfully updated file metadata, returns success status"

400.description: {object} controllers.Response "Bad request: Invalid file data or malformed JSON"

403.description: {object} controllers.Response "Forbidden: Insufficient permissions to update file"

404.description: {object} controllers.Response "Not found: File does not exist"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to update file"

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id ( owner/name ) of the hospital

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id ( owner/name ) of the image

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id ( owner/name ) of the machine

post.description: Update an existing message's content and metadata including text, author, tokens, vector scores, error information, and notification settings. Users can only update their own messages. Supports email notification if NeedNotify flag is set. Use isHitOnly parameter for updating only hit/feedback fields without full update.

parameters.name: isHitOnly
parameters.description: Update only hit/feedback fields when set to 'true', e.g., 'true'

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Complete message object with updated fields including text, author, tokenCount, vectorScores, errorText, needNotify, etc.

400.description: {object} controllers.Response "Bad request: Invalid message data or malformed JSON"

403.description: {object} controllers.Response "Forbidden: Cannot update other users' messages or insufficient permissions"

404.description: {object} controllers.Response "Not found: Message does not exist"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to update message or send email notification"

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id ( owner/name ) of the node

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id ( owner/name ) of the patient

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id ( owner/name ) of the pod

post.description: Update an existing AI provider's configuration including API keys, endpoints, model settings, and capabilities. Use this to modify provider credentials, change model parameters, or update service configurations. Requires appropriate permissions.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Complete provider object with updated fields including type, clientId, clientSecret, host, models, etc.

400.description: {object} controllers.Response "Bad request: Invalid provider data, missing required fields, or malformed JSON"

403.description: {object} controllers.Response "Forbidden: Insufficient permissions to update provider"

404.description: {object} controllers.Response "Not found: Provider does not exist"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to update provider"

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id ( owner/name ) of the record

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id ( owner/name ) of the scan

post.description: Update session for one user in one application.

Update an existing store's configuration and settings. Handles default store logic: prevents removing default status from the only default store, and automatically unsets other stores when setting a new default. Requires appropriate permissions.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Complete store object with updated fields including name, displayName, provider, embedding model, etc.

400.description: {object} controllers.Response "Bad request: Invalid store data, cannot unset default store, or malformed JSON"

403.description: {object} controllers.Response "Forbidden: Insufficient permissions to update store"

404.description: {object} controllers.Response "Not found: Store does not exist"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to update store"

post.description: Update an existing template's configuration, parameters, and metadata. Templates define reusable settings that can be applied when creating new instances of applications, workflows, or agents. Requires appropriate permissions.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Template object with updated fields including name, displayName, type, configuration, parameters, etc.

400.description: {object} controllers.Response "Bad request: Invalid template data or malformed JSON"

403.description: {object} controllers.Response "Forbidden: Insufficient permissions to update template"

404.description: {object} controllers.Response "Not found: Template does not exist"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to update template"

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: The store id of the file

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The details of the Tree File

post.description: Update vector embedding metadata including text content, file reference, data type, and store association. Can regenerate embedding if text content changes. Used to maintain vector index for semantic search. Requires appropriate permissions.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Vector object with updated fields including text, file, dataType, store, provider, etc.

400.description: {object} controllers.Response "Bad request: Invalid vector data or malformed JSON"

403.description: {object} controllers.Response "Forbidden: Insufficient permissions to update vector"

404.description: {object} controllers.Response "Not found: Vector does not exist"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to update vector or regenerate embedding"

post.description: Upload file content to Casdoor storage provider. Accepts base64 encoded file data and stores it in user-specific directory. File is uploaded to configured storage provider (local, S3, OSS, etc.). Returns the URL of uploaded file. Requires user authentication.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: Base64 encoded file data with data URI scheme, e.g., 'data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgo...'

200.description: {string} string "Successfully uploaded file, returns storage URL string"

400.description: {object} controllers.Response "Bad request: Missing required parameters, invalid file data format, or file too large"

500.description: {object} controllers.Response "Internal server error: Failed to decode file data or upload to storage"

errorText.description: Error message for the job execution

rawText.description: Raw result from scan (for Scan category providers)

runner.description: Hostname about who runs the scan job

target.description: Manual input target (IP address or network range)
